properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Should be a secure, random string with sufficient length.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time for access tokens in milliseconds. Default: 86400000 (24 hours)

properties.name: app.jwt.refresh-expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time for refresh tokens in milliseconds. Default: 604800000 (7 days)

properties.name: app.inter-service.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for inter-service communication.
